PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04892020-06-25,  ESDC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) support low and middle-income students to better afford the cost of post-secondary education for the 2020-21 loan year (August 1, 2020 â€“ July 31, 2021) given the immediate economic impacts they are facing from the COVID-19 pandemic; and (2) ensure that borrowers who are resuming their regular repayment arrangements at the end of the repayment moratorium will not be adversely impacted.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0144 Publication Date: 2020-07-08
AttachmentsAttachment
